title: 2003 Wigan Warriors season
text:
This article outlines the 2003 season for the British <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> club <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan Warriors</a>. This season saw them compete in the <a href="Super%20League%20VIII">Super League</a> and <a href="2003%20Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a>.
League table.

Cup run.
